attributes.action: bring back the 10 day authorised school holidays
attributes.additional_details: oppose the fines on poorer parents who cant afford to go on family holidays during school holidays . we say no to fines... and yes to clamping down on soaring holiday prices at home and away.. during school holidays ...why punish families? why not look at the holiday companies instead?? poorer families are being fined  for not being able to afford a family holiday out of sch term times how can this be right???? cant afford the holiday  so lets fine them and put them into more financial hardship? dont make any sense to me sign here if you agree...
